author: denverpost
title: Colorado AP high school football poll for Oct. 13, 2015
text:
Colorado AP high school football poll for Oct. 13, 2015 Here is The Associated Press high school football poll. The poll includes first-place votes in parentheses, season record, total points and last week's ranking, as voted upon by a statewide panel of sports writers. Teams are arranged in three divisions of equal size based on current enrollments.
SUBMIT: College commitments to The Denver Post
SUBSCRIBE: Weekly Prep Tally high school sports newsletter
The seventh regular season poll will be released in the afternoon on Tuesday, Oct. 20.
WATCH: #YoPreps with Neil Devlin
CLASS 5A SCHOOL RECORD POINTS LAST WEEK 1. Cherry Creek (9) 6-0 90 1 2. Columbine 6-0 81 2 3. Pomona 4-2 66 4 (tie) Valor Christian 4-2 66 3 5. Regis Jesuit 5-1 54 5 6. Ralston Valley 5-1 42 6 7. Arapahoe 6-0 35 7 8. Grandview 5-1 31 8 9. Fairview 5-1 16 9 10. Mullen 4-2 14 10
Others receiving votes: None
